author: Cloud2296
title: Best Train EVER!
review:
I got this set at Toys R Us when I was young, and it was on sale for 100 bucks. Great deal except the light didn't work. Here are the PROS and CONS

PROS:
great 'figs
good loading ramp
large 
inside and out are perfect and fully designed with      fireplaces and tables

CONS:
only 5 minifigs. should have more to fill it up

author: MGDawson
title: Nice 9V set
review:
I bought this from Bricklink for $120, plus shipping etc. Money well spent.

 

Pros:

  • The set has 16 curves track and 8 stright track pieces
  • Contains a complete train, of loco/tender, coach, lumber truck and caboose
  • Contains not only a motor but also a light!

Cons:

  • Limited Availability
  • Parts selection - rather large pieces in some parts.

 

If you have the opertunity to buy this, dont delay. It's an excellent MOC base if nothing more.
